document.full_text: after three sluggish losses in a row, the mets offense came to life in a victory over the nationals thanks to the awakening of carlos beltran's bat.
document.title: mets 8, nationals 4: beltran's homers lift mets at home
lines_and_colors: after three sluggish losses in a row, the mets offense came to life in a victory over the nationals thanks to the awakening of carlos beltran's bat.
